alert.note: Alert for Kane; La Salle; Northern Cook (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Chicago (Northeastern Illinois and Northwestern Indiana)
info.headline: Winter Storm Watch issued March 02 at 2:31PM CST until March 03 at 8:00PM CST by NWS Chicago
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WATCH NOW IN EFFECT FROM FRIDAY MORNING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Rain changing to heavy wet snow possible. Snow accumulations approaching 6 inches are possible. Winds could gust as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Portions of northern and north central Illinois. * WHEN...From late Friday morning through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Travel may be difficult. Hazardous conditions may impact the afternoon and evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A narrow band of heavy snow still has the potential to shift north and affect portions of the watch counties, particularly farther south and east.
info.instruction: Monitor the latest forecasts for updates on this situation.
